verses.roman:
śuni' mahāprabhu kahe,--śuna, dabira-khāsa
tumi dui bhāi--mora purātana dāsa

synonyms: śuni'-hearing this; mahāprabhu—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kahe—says; śuna—please hear; dabira khāsa—Dabira Khāsa; tumi—you; dui bhāi—two brothers; mora—My; purātana—old; dāsa—servants.
translation: After hearing the prayer of Dabira Khāsa and Sākara Mallika, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said, "My dear Dabira Khāsa, you two brothers are My old servants.
